bill.summary:
CT Colonography Screening for Colorectal Cancer Act of 2019
This bill (1) provides for Medicare coverage of screening computed tomography colonography (CTC) as a colorectal cancer screening test, and (2) excludes screening CTC from a special Medicare payment rule applicable to certain imaging services.
